channel.title: Poets Coop Podcast
channel.description: Free Audio Excerpts from the Poets Co-op Poetry Reading as well as Video from the Poets Co-op TV Show

channel.itunes:subtitle: Poets Coop Videos and MP3s
channel.itunes:author: M. D. Friedman

item.title: Oswald LeWinter Surprises the Poets Coop
item.itunes:author: M. D. Friedman
item.dc:creator: M. D. Friedman
item.description: LeWinter, winner of the prestigious Rilke Prize and grandson of Albert Einstein, surprised the Poets\\\\\\\' Co-op crowd by showing up and reading his poetry at the Open Reading in Loveland, Colorado, on October 4, 2007.

item.title: Lenny Chernila performing Follow the Money with ART COMPOST and THE WORD MECHANICS
item.itunes:author: M. D. Friedman
item.dc:creator: M. D. Friedman
item.description: From Poets Co-op TV Episode 13 with ART COMPOST and THE WORD MECHANICS -- this excerpt features poets Lenny Chernila and SETH performing Lenny Chernilas poem, Follow the Money on CCTV 54 in Louisville, Colorado on June 1, 2008. The improvisations of musicians Ivan Huber, guitar, Mark Lane, bass, Ruel Hatcher, congas, and John Rasmussen, woodwinds, set the tone for this powerful political piece. Please see www.videopoetry.org for great free video poetry downloads for your I-pod.

item.title: Poets Co-op TV Show Special Feature Episode 41 with Ted Kooser
item.itunes:author: M. D. Friedman
item.dc:creator: M. D. Friedman
item.description: An excerpt featuring Ted Kooser reading Pearl and That Was I at the Boulder Library, a special feature for the month of March, 2011. This special feature for the month of March, 2011, captures the historic free reading and discussion with the 13th Poet Laureate of the United States at the Boulder Library on March 5, 2011. This Episode 41 of the Poets Co-op TV Show is a special unedited 58 minute video filmed and produced by M. D. Friedman. This show was broadcast on CCTV 54 at Catalyst High School in Lafayette, Colorado, in March and April of 2011 and is made available now by the Internet Poets Cooperative. We want to thank the Boulder Library and the Lafayette Cultural Arts Commission for making this show possible. Please see www.videopoetry.org for more great poetry.
item.itunes:subtitle: Poets Co-op TV Show Episode 41 with Ted Kooser
item.itunes:summary: An excerpt featuring Ted Kooser at the Boulder Library

item.title: Poets Co-op TV Show Special Feature Episode 44 with Rita Dove
item.itunes:author: M. D. Friedman
item.dc:creator: M. D. Friedman
item.description: An excerpt featuring Rita Dove reading Canary, Ghost Walk at the Rialto Theater in Loveland, Colorado, on May 28, 2011. The Poets\' Co-op TV Show is proud to broadcast this historic reading of and discussion with a former Poet Laureate of the United States. Rita Dove performs Canary, Ghost Walk and Prose in a Small Space in this 10 minute excerpt. This Episode 44 of the Poets Co-op TV Show is a special 88 minute video filmed and produced by M. D. Friedman. This show was broadcast on CCTV 54 at Catalyst High School in Lafayette, Colorado, in June of 2011, and is made available now by the Internet Poets\' Cooperative. We want to thank the Poet Laureate Committee and the city of Loveland for making this event possible. Please see www.videopoetry.org for more great poetry.
item.itunes:subtitle: Poets Co-op TV Show Episode 44 with Rita Dove
item.itunes:summary: An excerpt featuring Rita Dove reading Canary, Ghost Walk at the Rialto Theater in Loveland, Colorado, on May 28, 2011.

item.title: M. D. Friedman on the Poets Co-op TV Show Episode 45
item.itunes:author: M. D. Friedman
item.dc:creator: M. D. Friedman
item.description: An excerpt from the Poets Co-op TV Show Episode 45 recorded June 8, 2011. This video features M. D. Friedman reading from his chapbook, Leaning Toward Whole, at his book release party at the Innisfree Poetry Book Store in Boulder, Colorado. The poems include in this excerpt are Raven's Treat, Spring Love Poem, Li Po Returns to His Lover in the Night and Never Ask a Poet Directions. A digital poem version of Never Ask a Poet Directions is availble at http://movielocker.com/groups/149. Please see www.videopoetry.org for more great poetry!
item.itunes:subtitle: M. D. Friedman on the Poets Co-op TV Show

item.title: Excerpts from the Poets Co-op TV Episode 54 Featuring Rosemerry Wahtola Trommer
item.itunes:author: M. D. Friedman
item.dc:creator: M. D. Friedman
item.description: Excerpts from the Poets' Co-op TV Episode 54 featuring Rosemerry Wahtola Trommer reading at her Liquid Light Press Book Launch Party on February 24, 2012. She is reading from her chapbook, The Miracle Already Happening, Everyday Life with Rumi released by Liquid Light Press in the Winter of 2012. (See www.liquidlightpress.com for details.) The reading was held a Ziggie's Lounge in Denver, Colorado, and this excerpt includes three poems for the book, "Rumi Goes to the Beach," "Rumi Goes to the Kindergarten" & "Dear Rumi." Please see www.videopoetry.org for more great poetry.
